cc.0:
This video will demonstrate
how to download different

formats of transcript and
closed caption files.

You can download individual
files or an entire folder
whenever you want.

Note that your transcript and
caption files are stored in

your account indefinitely, and
you can access them anytime.

To download an individual file,
navigate to the Files

tab and click the
Download button.
Select which formats you need.

You can now instantly download
a Zip file containing your

selected transcript
and caption files.

You can also download
an entire folder
from the Folders tab.

After selecting the formats you
need, your request will
begin processing.

This can take a few minutes or
longer depending on the number
and size of your files.

When the Zip file with your
outputs is ready to be

downloaded, the Download Folder
button will appear.

Thank you for watching this
video on downloading

transcript closed
caption files.

Please feel free email or
call us any questions.
